fields_of_interest: Consumers, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Regional Policy, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
IAAPA EMEA follows these policy areas on EU level: Safety, accessibility, consumer policy, VAT, taxation, health policy, employment and social policy, skills development, tourism policy, visas and travel restrictions, data protection, general product safety, digitalisation. 
 
IAAPA EMEA follows these legislative files: the Machinery Directive, European Accessibility Act, the Brexit process, Geo-blocking, visa code, New Skills Agenda, Digital Single Market
organisation_name: International Association of Amusement Parks and Attractions - Europe, Middle East and Africa (IAAPA EMEA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: IAAPA EMEA belongs to an informal coalition called NET which represents the interests of the private sector in tourism in Europe.
goals__remit: Our goal is to serve our membership by promoting safe operations, global development of the industry, professional growth and the commercial success of the amusement parks and attractions industry.
